articles.title: 'Sad and disappointed': COVID-19 vaccination clinics at Alberta-U.S. border cancelled - CTV Toronto
articles.description: U.S. Customs and Border Protection said last week Canadians attempting to drive across the American border solely for a COVID-19 vaccination, even with a doctor's referral, would be denied entry.
articles.content:

articles.title: Vaccinations' lag in South a US worry - Northwest Arkansas Democrat-Gazette
articles.description: Almost half of Americans have received at least one dose of a covid-19 vaccine. But the U.S. vaccination story varies widely across regions, with New England surging ahead of the national average and much of the South lagging far behind.

articles.title: 63% of Filipinos prefer American-made COVID-19 vaccines —SWS survey - GMA News Online
articles.description: Sixty-three percent of Filipinos preferred to receive vaccines manufactured in the United States to protect themselves from the coronavirus disease, results from a 2021 Social Weather Stations poll showed Monday.
